entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Humboldt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
